page.title: 10A Day with the Deans
page.content: We are a {family}of seven; the youngest are twin boys-6yrs, my next brother-8,my sister-10,me-11,+Mum+Dad. At the weekend we all get up between 7.30 and 8.30am. We have breakfast before watching some television. Our Mum gets rather aggravated that we just sit round watching the T.V., so she tells us to help her tidy up the house. For lunch we usually have a big meal like sausage and chips. After lunch we go and play around outside or go to the swimming. We have a dog, a golden retriever that we have to take for daily walks. We give him fresh water and food every morning. At about 5 pm we have tea, sandwiches etc. We then watch T.V. again while Mum and Dad have their dinner and soon it is time for bed.
